text: Abu'l-Abbas ibn Ja'far ibn al-Furat was the son of the powerful Ikhshidid vizier Ja'far ibn al-Furat. He was in turn appointed vizier by the Fatimid caliph al-Hakim (r. 996–1021) in 1014/5, but executed after a few days. ==References== ==Sources== * * Category:10th-century births Category:1014 deaths Category:11th-century Arabs Abu'l-Abbas Category:Viziers of the Fatimid Caliphate Category:People executed by the Fatimid Caliphate Category:11th- century people of the Fatimid Caliphate
title: Abu'l-Abbas ibn al-Furat
